sentences.en: A sentinel struck the rings of his carbine against his left hand.
sentences.cn: 一个哨兵把他的步枪拍的一声转到左手。

sentences.en: a tall round tower standing sentinel over the river
sentences.cn: 镇守在河边的一座高高的圆塔

sentences.en: a tall round tower standing sentinel over the river.
sentences.cn: 一座高高耸立在河上方的圆塔。

sentences.en: At either end of the bridge a sentinel stood with rifle at ready.
sentences.cn: 桥的两头各有一名哨兵,荷枪实弹守卫着.

sentences.en: Behind the sentinel was a staircase with twenty steps.
sentences.cn: 那个哨兵的后面有一座二十级的台阶.

sentences.en: Cedar columns stand sentinel in the ceremony rooms, their quiet strength connecting the congregants to this heritage.
sentences.cn: 雪松如列站在仪式室的哨兵，它们宁静庄严的气质将活动与场地联系在一起。

sentences.en: Changed Sentinel consumable shop model.
sentences.cn: 改变了近卫某商店的模型.

sentences.en: Luna is a shining beacon for the Sentinel, an ever vigilant protector.
sentences.cn: 露娜是近卫军团的一盏明灯, 是永不松懈的守卫.

sentences.en: Moreover, at the gateway of every reading lesson stood sentinel an array of words, with separated syllables, and forbidding accent marks like fixed bayonets, barring the way to the infant mind.
sentences.cn: 在每一课文的入口，都排列着一队音节分开的生字的哨兵，禁止通行的重音符号就像一把把瞄准的刺刀，阻挡了小孩的心的进入通道。

sentences.en: My mother tiptoed from their room to find me patiently waiting in the same spot she had left me, standing like a sentinel in the hallway.
sentences.cn: 母亲从她们房间蹑手蹑脚地走出来，看到我耐心地等在原地，像个哨兵似的站在走廊上。

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the sentinel clot sign in blunt upper abdominal trauma.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨急性上腹部钝挫伤哨兵血块征的价值.

sentences.en: One of the campers sentinel while the others slept.
sentences.cn: 在其他露营者睡觉时,有一位露营者站岗守卫.

sentences.en: Sentinel lymph node biopsy ( SLNB ) is helpful to predict lymphatic metastasis.
sentences.cn: 应用 前哨 淋巴结活检技术,有助于预测区域淋巴结的转移状况.

sentences.en: SENTINEL? Model 880 source projectors are portable, lightweight and compact industrial radiographic exposure devices.
sentences.cn: 进口工业网SENTINEL? 880型号激光投射器便携式设计 、 小巧轻盈,并具有紧凑的工业设计外壳.

sentences.en: She said it is important to remember that in villages, there will always be an increasing number of sentinel birds between vaccination campaigns as chicks are constantly hatching.
sentences.cn: 她说，在农村，在接种疫苗的战役之间总是存在数量不断增长的"哨兵"禽类，因为小鸡会不断地孵化出来。 意识到这一点是很重要的。

sentences.en: soldiers stood sentinel with their muskets.
sentences.cn: 士兵们持枪站 岗。

sentences.en: The lone sentinel walked toward his post.
sentences.cn: 忧愁的哨兵走向岗哨.

sentences.en: The press is a sentinel of our liberty.
sentences.cn: 新闻界是捍卫我们自由的卫兵.

sentences.en: Twenty - four Hour Sentinel Flush keeps fixture fresh during periods of nonuse.
sentences.cn: 如果24小时内无人使用,则这种冲水阀能够自动冲刷一次,以保持卫生洁具的干净清洁.

sentences.en: We gave the watchword, and the sentinel let us pass.
sentences.cn: 我们说出口令, 哨兵就把我们放过去了.

sentences.en: We must stand sentinel to protect ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们必须时刻警惕保护我们自己.

sentences.en: Zichuan Zhaili Shuai Woodplant in Yantai Yu sentinel watches plant production units.
sentences.cn: 淄川寨里帅达木器厂是烟台禹河钟表厂定点生产单位.
